long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you remember the 90's and early 2000's ? 
The market was full with CDs for CD Burners.
This is a small reminder for a terrific and beautiful era. 
We bring you Retro CD Covers backgrounds on each new tab and a search field for your conveniency.

Important notice:
RetroCDCoversNewTab extension will change your Google Chrome New Tab setting along with New Tab search.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to install the RetroCDCoversNewTab extension and set the new tab setting and new tab search to the one provided by the service.
By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy as provided in the links below.

The search features within the extension will be provided by Bing.  

Terms & Conditions:
https://home.americads.net/terms.html
Privacy Policy:
https://home.americads.net/privacy.html

You can remove or disable this extension at any time you desire.
Please find instructions below if such case arises:
https://home.americads.net/uninstall.html

For any other inquiries or questions please do contact us:
sales@americads.net

*RetroCDCoversNewTab backgrounds are free, made by our creative department.
